name: Rusty Blade - the last quest
description:
After 30 years, an old adventurer comes out of retirement to gain one last level, the arduous level 99. As the dust falls off the rusty blade thoughts of regret and awakened wonderment of what is to come begin to seep in...

Controls:

Witch MovementArrow Key / WASD
Camera Pivot
click and drag the mouse

Inspired by Daniel Ponce Rusty Blade famicase art;
Rusty Blade was made for A Game By Its Cover 2022 jam

On a more personal note: this fictional cartridge didn't leave my mind from the moment I saw it in 2017 so 5 years ago... Until now! I am now finally free, and you can play this magnificent RPG from a person that never really played one themselves. Have Fun!
